trans-unit.source: Represents a data view on an XML node or collection of XML nodes for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje widoku danych w węźle XML lub kolekcja węzłów XML <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>Formant może ona powodować jej odpowiednie dane w formacie zarówno tabular i hierarchiczne do kontrolki serwera sieci Web, które należy powiązać go.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> to bind to XML data and present it in list or tabular form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to XML data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: Formanty, takie jak <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>lub <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>Użyj <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>powiązać dane XML oraz zaprezentować go na liście lub w formie tabelarycznej, podczas gdy formantów, które pochodzą z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klas, takich jak <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, powiązać dane XML i prezentować hierarchię.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> creates each view type internally through different code paths.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>Tworzy każdy typ widoku wewnętrznie przez różne ścieżki.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>wywoływana jest metoda <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>kontroli, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>obiekt jest tworzony przez <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called, an XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView object is created.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>Klasy podano kontrolek serwera sieci Web, które pochodzą z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>i powiązać z listy i danych tabelarycznych, gdy XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView została podana dla sieci Web serwera określa, który pochodzi od <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>i powiązać z danymi hierarchicznymi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> classes call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> method of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object view to retrieve data from a data source, while a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Wewnętrznie <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl>klasy wywołania <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A>metody <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>widoku można pobrać danych ze źródła danych, gdy klasa pochodzi od obiektu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>wywołania <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>— Metoda.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> helper objects, the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Takich jak wszystkie <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>obiekty Pomocnik XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView definiuje operacje, jakie źródła danych można wykonywać z użyciem danych.</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control does not support sort expressions or execute, delete, or update operations.
trans-unit.target: Ponieważ XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView klasy tylko przesłonięcia <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>Metoda, skojarzony <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>formant nie obsługuje wyrażeń sortowania lub wykonania, usunąć ani zaktualizować operacji.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the data items from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera listę elementów danych ze źródła danych.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> and can be used like any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection.

Call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method to get an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> and iterate through the collection of <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> nodes, or use `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Wywołanie <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>metodę, aby pobrać <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>i iterowania po kolekcji <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>węzłów lub użyj `foreach` (w języku C#) lub `For Each` (Visual Basic).</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> collection of data items based on the hierarchical level of the current view.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> Kolekcja elementów danych oparta na poziomie hierarchii bieżącego widoku.
